objects.specification: A wide, flat rectangular surface that serves as the classroom floor. It has a smooth, slightly textured finish that suggests a neutral grey material with subtle variations in tone. The surface is designed to appear durable and even, providing a realistic floor plane for the space.

A tall vertical rectangular surface forming one side of the classroom, with a smooth finish and a two-tone paint scheme blending green and beige. The surface has a slight matte texture and clean straight edges, providing a cohesive backdrop that encloses the space and enhances the prehistoric ambiance.

A tall vertical rectangular surface forming one side of the classroom, with a smooth finish and a two-tone paint scheme blending green and beige. The surface has a slight matte texture and clean straight edges, providing a cohesive backdrop that encloses the space and enhances the prehistoric ambiance.

The surface has a slight matte texture and clean straight edges, providing a cohesive backdrop that encloses the space and enhances the prehistoric ambiance.

A tall vertical rectangular surface forming one side of the classroom, with a smooth finish and a two-tone paint scheme blending green and beige. The surface has a slight matte texture and clean straight edges, providing a cohesive backdrop that encloses the space and enhances the prehistoric ambiance.

A medium-sized rectangular desk with a rich darker woodgrain texture, featuring subtle bevels along the edges and sturdy rectangular legs. The surface is broad enough to accommodate teaching materials and has a slight gloss to simulate polished wood. Underneath, it shows realistic joinery and support beams for a solid appearance.

A large rectangular board with a deep matte green writing surface framed by a slim, dark matte border. The surface has a slightly rough chalkboard texture to allow chalk to adhere cleanly and erase easily. It appears solidly mounted with subtle hardware details along the edges.

A low rectangular pedestal stand with a light wood finish, featuring a simple box shape and sharp edges. The stand has a smooth top surface and subtly textured sides to simulate a natural tan wood grain. It is designed to hold decorative models securely in place.

A stylized yet realistic dinosaur model with detailed scale texture and a dynamic pose. The form incorporates anatomically inspired limbs and a balanced stance. Subtle variations in shading highlight muscle contours and skin folds, giving a lifelike prehistoric impression.

A low rectangular pedestal stand with a light wood finish, featuring a simple box shape and sharp edges. The stand has a smooth top surface and subtly textured sides to simulate a natural tan wood grain. It is designed to hold decorative models securely in place.

A stylized yet realistic dinosaur model with detailed scale texture and a dynamic pose. The form incorporates anatomically inspired limbs and a balanced stance. Subtle variations in shading highlight muscle contours and skin folds, giving a lifelike prehistoric impression.

A small rectangular desk with a light brown woodgrain finish and a smooth tabletop surface. It features slender metal legs and a subtle overhang at the front edge. The design is simple and functional, with slight chamfered corners to reduce sharp edges while maintaining a clean silhouette.

A matching student chair with a curved backrest and gently angled, supportive legs. The seat and back surfaces have a smooth finish in a complementary earthy tone, and subtle cushioning is hinted at by soft rounded edges. The chair appears ergonomically shaped for comfort with a slight tilt at the back.

A thin rectangular panel with a glossy finish displaying vibrant dinosaur-themed illustrations. The surface has a slight sheen to simulate laminated print material, and edges are crisp and well-defined. The images appear detailed, educational, and eye-catching against a neutral background.

A tall multi-shelf bookcase constructed from warm wood with a smooth finish. Each shelf is filled with neatly arranged books of various heights, and the overall frame has simple straight lines and subtle edge profiling. The surface has a slight sheen to simulate polished wood.

A large rectangular display cabinet with a transparent glass front and a sturdy frame. Inside, it features horizontal shelves holding replica dinosaur fossils. The frame has a subtle cool metallic finish and clean lines. The glass surface appears clear, providing unobstructed views of the contents.

A circular wall-mounted clock with a minimal thin frame and a clean face. The clock face is plain with simple hour markers and hands, giving a modern utilitarian aesthetic. The surface has a slight gloss to simulate polished plastic or metal.

A medium-sized potted plant with lush green foliage. The leaves are broad, slightly glossy, and varied in size to create a natural arrangement. The pot is a simple tapered container with a smooth neutral finish, and the plant appears healthy and vibrant.

A small round flush-mounted ceiling light fixture with a thin rim and a diffused translucent cover. The cover has a slight matte finish to softly scatter light evenly across the room. The fixture is simple and unobtrusive, integrated seamlessly into the ceiling surface.
